name: Blast Radius
overview: Kayne, the sole survivor of the Wolf Squadron, is tasked with saving the Vorn which is being attacked from the nefarious Kotan-Kal. For offering to help the Vorn out, Kayne is given his choice of the Vorn's most advanced spacecraft and weapons. In this space combat game, Kayne has the choice of 1 of 9 different spacecrafts which differ in appearance, weaponry, and control. Kayne is tasked with completing 40 different missions while fighting 37 different types of enemy crafts, which include bounty hunters, crime spaceships and military ships. • Take control in one of four assault craft. • Battle against 32 different, highly intelligent enemy craft types. • Blast away with an arsenal of over 15 destructive weapons. • Explore asteroid belts, uncover cloaked planets and satellites, journey down wormholes, encounter kamikaze drones and much, much more. • 2 player link up mode for co-operative or deathmatch levels.
